The Camera¶

What is it?¶

The camera is the viewpoint that shapes render from.

Moving the camera¶

The camera is moved with the function moveCamera(axis, amount). Bear in mind that axis must be upper case.

Rotating the camera¶

The camera cannot be rotated.
